name: trivia
description: Testez vos connaissances de Minecraft avec ce quiz d'anecdotes !
defaultGamemodeDescription: 1 question de trivia Minecraft sera posée, tous les utilisateurs peuvent y participer.
showdownGamemodeDescription: Users have 1 minute to enter the showdown round, once the round starts 10 Minecraft trivia questions will be asked. Each question users will have 30 seconds to answer. If a user answers incorrectly or runs out of time they are eliminated.
